topic.title: Creating Mingle projects
topic.p: Before your team can start using Mingle, you must create and configure a project. You must be a Mingle administrator to create new projects, and you can create as many projects as you like.
Create new projects from the Current projects page. This is the first page you see after signing in to Mingle.
topic.note: If you can't see any options to create new projects, you're not registered as Mingle administrator. Please contact a Mingle administrator to update your privileges.

section.title: There are three ways you can create projects

subsection.title: Create a new project from templates
Create a new project from scratch
Create a new project from importing existing projects

topic.p: After creating a new project you can also import existing card data from Microsoft Excel.
topic.hint: It's a good idea to first add users to Mingle before creating a project. Until you've added users, you'll be unable to assign any team members.
topic.p: After you've created a project, you must configure the project accordingly. If you've imported an existing project or template, you may only have to modify a few properties and settings. However, if you create a new project from scratch, you must add all properties and settings manually.
